#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long int check(long long int n,long long int s)
{
	if(n<0)
	{
		long long int v=0-n;
		n=v;
	}
	while(n)
	{
		s=s+n%10;
		n=n/10;
	}
	return s;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n;
		cin>>n;
		long long int h=check(n,0);
		long long int k=h%9;
		if(k<9-k)
		{
			
			cout<<k;
		}
		else if(9-k<k)
		{
			 cout<<9-k;
		}
	
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
